level.heading: Maintenance of documents.
level.text: Copies of the specimen bonds and of the final financing documents and closing documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.
